document: THE WALLACE CAMPAIGN WORKER IN WAYNE COUNTY, MICHIGAN by James Lewis Canfield A dissertation submitted in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy (Political Science) in The University of Michigan 1971 Doctoral Committee: Professor Samuel J.
